cause.description:
The Tasmanian Devils, native only to Tasmania, Australia, have been decreasing in numbers for the past 10-12 years. Little is known about the facial tumor disease that has been killing off the Devils, but what is known is that there are only about 50% left of one of Tassie's greatest species. Something needs to be done...and soon. Tassie has already lost the Tasmanian Tiger, lets not let another of it's species become extinct
1. You can donate to this cause, but this website is better for donations, http://www.tassiedevil.com.au/index.html
cause.mission: Save the Tasmanian Devils from Disease
cause.name: Save the Tassie Devils
